four attention is invited to the following applications for a ctive and associate
membership in the National Association of Educational Broadcasters. These applications
have been received in the office of the Executive Director and have been cleared by
that office for presentation to the Officers, Directors and Membership Committee for
immediate action. Please use the ballot furnished, vote and return to NAEB Headquarters.
Information regarding each of these applicants has been taken directly from their
applications.
